items.sentence: Even though Tom threatened me, I wasn't scared.
Why do we have to be working on such a hot day?
In a way you're right, but I still have doubts.
What are you eating? I'll order the same thing.
Tom has had many of the same problems I've had.
The bartender kicked us out of the bar at 2:30.
Tom has just gotten home from walking the dogs.
The police are out with dogs searching for Tom.
It seemed that Tom already knew the dog's name.
How long did Tom say that he'd be in Australia?
